short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create your own GPT bot, traing it with your own data and use it to generate text for your organization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pick a name for your AI. It will become your most brilliant partner for life.
Get help from your own AI on any website you are browsing. 
Train your AI without coding knowledge and with little or no effort.
Share your AI with your team and use it together.

With Rigobot, you can:

- Browse any website on the web and ask Rigo.AI for help on hundreds of tasks like translations, summarizations, creating blog posts, tweets, and more.
- Have Rigo.AI read any website or document and use the knowledge to help you better in the future or answer any questions you may have about it.
- Create your own AI, pick a name, and set rules for personality, tone, and more.
- Share your AI with other team members and collaborate on making it better!
- Launch a "training campaign" on any topic, and your AI will start asking questions to the team to become better!
